custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain) FROM Koroneiki_ExternalLink WHERE Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain LIKE ?
SELECT DISTINCT(Koroneiki_ExternalLink.entityName) FROM Koroneiki_ExternalLink WHERE (Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain = ?) AND (Koroneiki_ExternalLink.entityName LIKE ?)
